name: Richard Hopper
description: I’m Richard Hopper i’m single parent, a sailor am looking for a woman that am going to have a serious life time relationship with and is really nice meeting we can start communication here and get to know if we both are the right match for each other and plan on how to met in person ,…. Have been single for 4 year now i lost my wife to cancer of the lungs and since then have been single have not date any other woman i just make up my mind to start up a life time relationship with one woman that is the reason why have been from a very small family
